name: Hexa Wood Block Puzzle!
description:
HEXA BLOCK PUZZLE is a Tetris-style puzzle game, an addictive block puzzle. Easy to play, and pleasurable game for all ages.

HEXA BLOCK PUZZLE can be considered a full-brain workout. It helps develop the spatial skills, maintain and improve the ever-important short-term memory for players.

The goal is to drag pieces to board and fill up all grids to level up. It comes with 4 difficulties ranging from Beginner to Expert and there are 240 levels in total. The first of these consists of a few large pieces and slowly evolve with the player to include more advanced frames and shapes with smaller and more complex piece-sizes.

HEXA BLOCK PUZZLE FEATURES:
- Ideal for all ages
- 240 levels with 4 difficulties (Beginner, Advanced, Master & Expert)
- Come play every day to receive daily special gift
- Easy to learn and assert to outright all levels
- Enjoy game anytime or anywhere
- Game is auto-saved when you quit or turn off your phone
- Soothing sounds and alluring effects

Have fun playing HEXA BLOCK PUZZLE!
